name: places/ChIJYT8E5vRZwokR2XGYzy9Ek3Q
formattedAddress: 169 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 169 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013-2154, USA

originalText.text: GK Framing specializing in framing stands as a paragon of artistic ingenuity under the stewardship of its exceptionally skilled proprietor. Exhibiting a profound understanding of the nuanced exigencies of its clientele, the proprietor’s discerning approach permeates every facet of the establishment. Paramount among its distinguishing attributes is an unyielding commitment to meticulous attention to detail, thereby transmuting each framing endeavor into an exemplar of precision and artistic refinement. The store’s singular prowess is in transforming the act of framing into a highly personalized and discerningly curated narrative and converting the artworks into enduring artifacts of visual opulence.

originalText.text: I thoroughly enjoyed working with GK Framing.  Their work is first rate, and the recommendations they made for replacement frames for my antique maps has significantly improved the overall look of them.  I would definitely recommend them!

text.text: I thoroughly enjoyed working with GK Framing.  Their work is first rate, and the recommendations they made for replacement frames for my antique maps has significantly improved the overall look of them.  I would definitely recommend them!

originalText.text: High quality workmanship. I had what I think is a fairly complicated large 3D artwork that needed support and framing. GK Framing understood what was needed, paid attention to details, and produced a great result.

text.text: High quality workmanship. I had what I think is a fairly complicated large 3D artwork that needed support and framing. GK Framing understood what was needed, paid attention to details, and produced a great result.

originalText.text: Very high quality work, professional service, and added benefit of their design advice. Highly recommend to anyone in need of high-end framing

text.text: Very high quality work, professional service, and added benefit of their design advice. Highly recommend to anyone in need of high-end framing

originalText.text:
I've been so lucky to work with GK Framing and their highly skilled team for more than 20 years. Their work has been uniformly exquisite:  I recommend them highly and without hesitation.

Some might think Elizabeth is in the framing business, or the electronics business through her amazing Reflectel product.  The truth for me is that Elizabeth is in the trust business.  I trust her with some possessions that are invaluable to me.  I trust her passion and her elegant eye to reveal the inner beauty of any piece she is handling.  I trust her caring and concern to deliver my piece back to me safely and yet revealed in some new way because of the new home and surrounding she so artfully crafts for everything she does.  She is also an extraordinary listener so she won't let her vision (however brilliant) overrun yours.  Working with GK is a treasure and a gift!  Work with the GK team and you can confidently trust them to deliver extraordinary results that you will love!!  I think they are the very best whether you have a seven (or eight) figure auction piece, or a family treasure that is priceless to you.  The GK team is comprised of caring artisans and craftspeople whose work will delight you!!
